snippet: The jury considering murder charges against David Tarloff sent a note to the judge requesting “clarification of the consequences of a hung jury,” and added, “We are at risk.”
lead_paragraph: The jury considering murder charges against David Tarloff sent a note to the judge requesting “clarification of the consequences of a hung jury,” and added, “We are at risk.”

headline.seo: Jurors Hint at Deadlock in Tarloff Murder Case
headline.main: Jurors Hint at Deadlock Over Killing of Therapist
headline.print_headline: Jurors Hint At Deadlock Over Killing Of Therapist
